author: CMSBParking
body:
This PR contains models that are required by PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/32372 (which is a back port of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/31220).

There are two weights files:

`RunII_Autumn18_LowPtElectrons_mva_id.xml.gz`
- this is the model used by RECO throughout the 10_6_X release cycle 

`LowPtElectrons_ID_2020Sept15.root`
- this is the model to be used for reminiAOD UL (via the run2_miniAOD_UL modifier)
- is the same model used in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/31220
- has depth=15, trees=1000, extra variables, no regression, base on BParking samples.
title: LowPtElectrons: ID models for 10_6_X
